name: WeListen
overview: Besides developing custom enterprise software solutions, weListen offers platforms for Innovation Management (InnovationCast), Collaboration, knowledge and content management, communities and social networking.

milestones.description: WeListen's Enterprise Innovation Management platform  (InnovationCast) selected as a semifinalist of the Enterprise 2.0 Launchpad 2010.

video_embeds.description: InnovationCast - an end-to-end Enterprise Innovation Management software platform, developed by WeListen.
